HomePage.title: Environmental Photography Competition 2024
HomePage.introductionText: This competition is aiming to enhance the community sensibility towards environment and raise a new generation understand the importance of environment and becomes part of their daily behaviors.
HomePage.CompCategoriesTextMain: Focusing on all environmental related. All competition Professional, Kids and amateurs must comply with mentioned roles and submitted photos must be related to environmental issues such as:
HomePage.CompCategoriesTextSub2: -Weather changes impact on environment Universal lives, plants...etc.
HomePage.TermsAndConditionsText1: 1-The competition will start on 29 of July 2024 and end on 29 July 2024.
HomePage.TermsAndConditionsText2: 2-All contribution must be submitted in (JEPG) format.
HomePage.TermsAndConditionsText3: 3-Total contribution is not exceeding 4 photos, size within 200MB.
HomePage.TermsAndConditionsText4: 4-Editing, Photoshop and tuning is prohibited, photos must submitted as is.
HomePage.TermsAndConditionsText5: 5-Photos must be from Yanbu city and not didn't win any other official photo competition.
HomePage.TermsAndConditionsText6: 6-Photos can have a title and a description to to clarify the purpose/the message that you want pass of your photo.
HomePage.TermsAndConditionsText7: 7-The participant must write their name, phone number, and email.
HomePage.TermsAndConditionsText8: 8-Participating in this competition is a clear declaration from the participant that submitted photos are belong to him and he is authorizing us (the competition organizers) use subject photos in any publications with full rights without getting any permission from the mentioned.
HomePage.TermsAndConditionsText9: 9-The award committee has the right to reprint and copy the photos for free for any media purposes in newspapers, magazines, exhibitions, or annual calendars, as well as for all types of publishing by partners. Participation in the competition is considered acceptance of this.
HomePage.TermsAndConditionsText10: 10-Winners will be notified through email and phone number.
HomePage.rights: All Rights Reserved to the Royal Commission for Jubail and Yanbu 2024

FormPage.title: Environmental Photography Competition 2024
FormPage.PhotoLocationRequirements: Please attach the location where the photo was taken with a Google Maps link, for example: https://maps.app.goo.gl/qQT5wbQEhzz6CcdeA
FormPage.TermsAgreement: Checking the box is an acknowledgment that you have read the terms of the competition and acknowledges your acceptance of them

formErrorMessages.phoneNumberLessThanMin: Phone number must be at least 9 digits
formErrorMessages.phoneNumberLargerThanMax: Phone number must be at most 10 digits
formErrorMessages.locationRequired: The location of the image is required
formErrorMessages.termsAgreementRequired: Agreeing to the terms is required
